string.text: Tritium inserts
Installation of luminous night-sights allows for easier target acquisition in low-light conditions.
Rubberized buttplate
Installation of a rubberized buttplate on the stock absorbs much of the recoil felt by the shooter.
Forend replacement
Installation of a modern upper handguard with integrated Weaver rails, allowing for the addition of forend-mounted optics, flashlights, and laser sights.
Dovetail scope rail
Allows the mounting of most optics manufactured by participating countries of the Warsaw Pact.
Laser sight

Visually marks the weapon's point of impact in a straight line from the muzzle. Assists with target acquisition at close range where bullet deviation and trajectory drop are less of an issue. Installation does not prevent the addition of optics or a tactical flashlight.
Tactical flashlight
A long-range, narrow-field flashlight to assist with nighttime exploration and eliminates the need to hold one separately. Installation does not prevent the addition of optics or a laser sight.
Ergonomic grip
Installation of a more comfortable grip.
High-capacity magazine (black, 45 rounds)
Higher-capacity magazines means fewer reloads during combat and improves the odds of survival.
High-capacity magazine (brown, 45 rounds)
Higher-capacity magazines means fewer reloads during combat and improves the odds of survival.
High-capacity magazine (60 rounds)
A quad-stacked magazine holds even more ammunition than standard issue.
Lightweight alloy components
Replacing standard parts with lightweight alloys significantly reduces the weight of the gun.
Barrel alignment
Improves muzzle velocity for a flatter trajectory.
Calibrate the trigger group
Precision adjustment and balancing of the trigger components allows for higher accuracy and reduced recoil.
Reinforced trigger assembly
A refined trigger assembly allows for a faster rate of fire at the expense of some overall reliability.
Heavy-duty components
Replacing standard parts with analogs made of high-strength alloys increases the weapon's durability.
